text.sentence: I'm feeling pretty confident with how things are going.
I have received very positive feedback from my manager and my employees.
I have learned much from you, especially related to communication: recognizing the different types of people, different ways to communicate.
And, I appreciate the time you've spent with me.
However, I would like to discontinue our sessions for the time being.
When I'm in need of some "managing expertise" in the future, I will give you a call.
Again, thanks for working with me.
